import re

def remove_spaces_and_punctuation(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    return text

import re

def remove_spaces_and_punctuation(text):
    text = re.sub('\\s+', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    return text
